mapper.insert: INSERT INTO edu_class_student (class_id, student_id, create_time) VALUES (#{classId}, #{studentId}, #{createTime})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM edu_class_student WHERE class_id = #{classId} AND student_id = #{studentId}
